name: Media Technology Ventures
overview: Media Technology Ventures has been an innovator and strategic investor in radio and television spectrum, new media technologies and related software development for more than twenty years. In addition to investing in and incubating dozens of emerging media technologies, we use our patent pending SpectraMaxâ„¢ software and other proprietary technologies to expand the reach and coverage of wireless signals, creating substantial new value for spectrum owners. Founded in San Francisco, and now headquartered in Dallas, Media Technology Ventures has invested nearly a half billion dollars and has created more than $150 million of value for our stakeholders and partners.

funding_round.source_description: Axcient raises $9M for data protection and recovery
